title: Episode 657 - The Death Of Mainstream Media
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the death of American mainstream media and their refusal to report the truth.  Will it ever return to normal again or has it always been this way.  Dan thinks Walter Cronkite's reporting on the Vietnam War was the ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the death of American mainstream media and their refusal to report the truth.  Will it ever return to normal again or has it always been this way.  Dan thinks Walter Cronkite's reporting on the Vietnam War was the beginning of the end.
